name: 3D Ping Pong
description:
3D Ping Pong game that I made. It is my second project made. Might receive some updates later if I do come back to it. 

You can play vs AI or play vs someone next to you. For player 1 controls it is W and S and for player 2 controls it is the Up and Down arrow keys. Press M to go back to the main menu.
